headline: Is It Time To Reassess VICI Properties (VICI) After Recent Mixed Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether VICI Properties is offering fair value at its current price, you are not alone. Many income focused investors are asking the same question right now. The stock last closed at US$29.78, with returns of 4.5% over 30 days and 5.8% year to date, while the 1 year return sits at a 2.5% decline and the 5 year return at 34.9%. Recent headlines around VICI have focused on its position as a major owner of experiential real estate and its long term lease arrangements with...
